mapper.select: SELECT `id` as `id`, `to_account_type` as `toAccountType`, `account_id` as `accountId`, `title` as `title`, `content` as `content`, `generated_time` as `generatedTime`, `is_delete` as `isDelete` FROM `t_notice` WHERE `to_account_type` = #{toAccountType} AND `account_id` = #{accountId} AND `is_delete` = 0 ORDER BY `generated_time` DESC LIMIT #{beginIndex}, #{pageSize}
